entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
